sections.heading: 01|Acquisition of title to land by United States
sections.text: Effective:January 1, 1966Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 94 - 106th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFWhenever it is necessary for the United States to acquire title to a tract of land in this state for any purpose, and the state gives its

sections.heading: 05, inclusive, of the Revised Code shall not be retroactive or apply to any land acquired by the United States prior to May 6, 1902.
